---
title: Choline (Vitamin B4)
subtitle: False vitamin and Essential nutrient
---


Choline was originally classified as a B4 vitamin, but has lost its vitamin status and is now termed an "essential nutrient" since the body can synthesize it.



# Significance

- Associated with prevention of Alzheimer's Disease


# Dysfunction

- Anti-cholinergics medications can disurpt choline metabolism


# Dietary Sources

- Chicken eggs
- Beef liver
